nodes.documentation:
@title UpgradeablePausableProxy
@dev A proxy that allows the implementation address to be updated and contract execution to be paused
nodes.name: UpgradeablePausableProxy

nodes.documentation:
@dev Upgraded event is emitted every time the implementation is updated
@param _implementation Address of the new implementation contract
nodes.name: Upgraded

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the address of the current implementation
@return _implementation Address of the current implementation
nodes.name: implementation

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "New implementation address is not a contract"

arguments.value: New implementation address is not a contract

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "New implementation address is not a contract"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets the address of the current implementation
@param _newImplementation Address of the new implementation to be set
nodes.name: setImplementation

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "New implementation address is the same as current address"

arguments.value: New implementation address is the same as current address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "New implementation address is the same as current address"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Upgrades the implementation address
@param _newImplementation Address of the new implementation to be set
nodes.name: _upgradeTo

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Function not overwritten by implementing contract"

arguments.value: Function not overwritten by implementing contract

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Function not overwritten by implementing contract"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Upgrades the implementation address
@notice Must be overwritten by implemening contracts to report contract version
nodes.name: upgradeTo

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns true for contracts that adhere to the UpgradeableProxy interface 
@return Always returns true for this contract
nodes.name: isUpgradeable
